name: com.unity.xr.interaction.toolkit
description: A high-level, component-based, interaction system for creating VR and AR experiences. It provides a framework that makes 3D and UI interactions available from Unity input events. The core of this system is a set of base Interactor and Interactable components, and an Interaction Manager that ties these two types of components together. It also contains components that you can use for locomotion and drawing visuals.

samples.description: Assets to streamline setup of behaviors, including a default set of input actions and presets for use with XR Interaction Toolkit behaviors that use the Input System. Dependencies: • Shader Graph
Sample scene and other assets for hand-tracking integration with the XR Interaction Toolkit. Dependencies: • XR Hands • Shader Graph

Assets to streamline setup when building for Mobile AR or Mixed Reality with the XR Interaction Toolkit. This includes prefabs and demo scenes to get you started. Note: This depends on the Starter Assets sample package.
Assets related to the simulation of XR HMD and controllers.
Virtual spatial keyboard to allow for text entry in a world space UI. This interactable keyboard can be used in your app instead of the platform's system keyboard.
This sample provides ScriptableObjects to assist with migration from the older device-based controller input to be used with the new input readers introduced with version 3.0.0.

This sample provides a demo scene and prefabs designed to to help you get started developing on visionOS with the XR Interaction Toolkit. Dependencies: • AR Foundation • PolySpatial visionOS • PolySpatial XR • Shader Graph

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- Fixed missing Scripting API documentation on public enum value.
